mapper.select: select user_number , user_id , user_name , user_email , user_phone_number , user_gender ,user_status from tbl_user order by user_number desc limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
select user_number, user_status from tbl_User where User_id = #{userId} and User_password = #{userPassword}
select user_status from tbl_User where user_number = #{managerNumber}

select user_number, user_id, user_name, user_email, user_phone_number, user_gender, user_status from tbl_user where user_id like concat('%', #{userIdOrName}, '%') or user_name like concat('%', #{userIdOrName}, '%') limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
select count(user_number) from tbl_user where user_id like concat('%', #{userIdOrName}, '%') or user_name like concat('%', #{userIdOrName}, '%')

select u.user_number, u.user_id, count(p.post_number) as post_count, u.user_self_introduction, max(upi.user_profile_original_name) as user_profile_original_name, max(upi.user_profile_image_system_name) as user_profile_image_system_name, (select count(follow_number) from tbl_follow where follow_number = u.user_number) as following_count, (select count(following_number) from tbl_follow where following_number = u.user_number) as followers_count from tbl_user u left join tbl_post p on u.user_number = p.user_number left join tbl_user_profile_image upi on u.user_number = upi.user_number where u.user_number = #{managerNumber } group by u.user_number

select p.post_number , p.post_title , u.user_id , p.post_view_count , p.post_date from tbl_user u join tbl_post p on u.user_number = p.user_number order by p.post_number desc limit #{postStartRow}, #{rowCount}

select p.post_number , p.post_title , u.user_id , p.post_view_count , p.post_date from tbl_user u join tbl_post p on u.user_number = p.user_number where p.post_title like concat('%',#{postTitle}, '%') limit #{postStartRow}, #{rowCount}
select count(p.post_number) from tbl_user u join tbl_post p on u.user_number = p.user_number where p.post_title like concat('%',#{postTitle}, '%')

select order_number, o.user_number,u.user_id , order_date, order_address, order_message, order_total_cost, order_status, order_recipient from tbl_user u right outer join tbl_order o on u.user_number=o.user_number order by o.order_number desc limit #{orderStartRow}, #{rowCount}
